page.title: 10Adult Leisure Activities.
page.content: My mother's favourite leisure activities are gardening,watching television,swimming,knitting and also listening to music.My father's favourite leisure activities are watching television,listening to music,reading and watching games.The most popular activities in this class are watching television, knitting, swimming, do-it-yourself, listening to music and gardening.Most of the time my mother knits and watches television.She goes swimming sometimes and also gardening.Sometimes when there is nothing good on the television she listens to music.My father reads a lot especially in the night.Sometimes he listens to music and watches television.Most of the time he watches sport on television.
